physical_examinations.vital_signs: Calcium level: 12.3 mg/dL, PTH level: 421 pg/mL (preoperative); PTH level: 236 pg/mL (postoperatively); Final PTH level: 253 pg/mL
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Asymmetry in sestamibi imaging, confirming a mass in the left submandibular gland
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: PTH level decreased from 200 pg/mL to 36 pg/mL following reoperation on postoperative day 6

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Calcium levels ranged from 9.82 mg/dL to 11.0 mg/dL; PTH levels ranged from 955 pg/mL to 1552 pg/mL
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Intraoperative findings showed left superior and inferior parathyroid glands removed, PTH level post-operation was 420 pg/mL
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: PTH level decreased from 1019 pg/mL to 562 pg/mL after removal of the right superior parathyroid and right thyroid lobe on postoperative day 8

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Calcium level: 12.6 mg/dL, PTH level: 1302 pg/mL
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Intraoperatively, a left inferior undescended parathyroid adenoma at the level of the mandible was identified
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Final PTH level was 62 pg/mL after the adenoma was removed
